us.phonetic: /ɪˈkwɪvələnt/, (i kwiv′ə lənt or, for 5, ē′kwə vā′lənt)

example.eg: I weigh 127 lbs. What's the equivalent in kilos?
example.egtrans: 我体重127磅。对等换算是多少公斤？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对等, 相等物, 对应物

example.eg: Nancy did such a good job of organizing the branch office that she was given a promotion and asked to put an equivalent system in place across all the firm's offices.
example.egtrans: 南希组织分支办事处，工作做得不错，获得了晋升，被要求在公司所有办公室都设置相同的系统。

example.eg: I spent money on a new car, but my husband gave the equivalent sum to charity.
example.egtrans: 我花钱买了新车，但我丈夫把同等数额的钱捐给了慈善机构。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 等值的, 等价的, 同等的

example.eg: Each sugar cube is equivalent to one teaspoon of sugar.
example.egtrans: 每一块方糖相当于一茶匙糖的量。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相当于...的, 与...对等的

example.eg: My new car cost the equivalent of a year's salary.
example.egtrans: 我在新车上花的钱等于一年的薪水。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与...相同的, 与...相等的, 等于...

us.phonetic: /ɪˈkwɪvələnt/, (i kwiv′ə lənt or, for 5, ē′kwə vā′lənt)

example.eg: What you just did is equivalent to stealing.
A litre is equivalent to 0.264 US gallons.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不相等的, 不相当的
